title: The Night
creator_credit: Justin Milne, Scott McDonald and SGIC
brief_description: A dramatisation involving a group of young adults who have just received their licence and become involved in a road accident due to alcohol and inexperience. Looks at the consequences of actions and how wrong decisions can effect someone’s life forever.
description: A dramatisation involving a group of young adults who have just received their licence and become involved in a road accident due to alcohol and inexperience. Looks at the consequences of actions and how wrong decisions can effect someone’s life forever.
